title: Photo Panel, Nine Ways to Use a Pitcher, 2012
title_raw: Nine Ways to Use a Pitcher
gallery_text: The handles in these pitchers accommodate different user behaviors. Ransmeier made cardboard prototypes to establish the basic shape and performance of each vessel. He worked with artisans from GlassLab, a mobile hot-glass studio operated by the Corning Museum of Glass, to translate his prototypes into glass.
